long_description:
# Minetest Stats
A mod to allow real world data to be shown in game. It has the following blocks:

- real world time block

- server uptime block

- Uptime formatter block

- Time formatter block

- Positon block

## Status
- This Mod was created as a project and is unlikely to be maintained long term. 
## Docs
- [doc.md](docs/doc.md)
name: digiline_stats
short_description: A mod that adds a few digiline blocks to get server information
title: Digiline Stats
